## Notes:

- Values in the figures represent the proportion of robust cases.
- The blue bar represents proportions greater than or equal to .90.
- The red bar represents proportions less than .90.

```{r}
#| message = FALSE
library(manMCMedMiss)
library(party)
```

```{r}
results_no_adj <- results
results_no_adj <- results_no_adj[
  which(
    !(
      results_no_adj$method %in% c("MC.MI.ADJ", "SIG.MI.ADJ")
    )
  ),
]
results_no_adj$method <- factor(results_no_adj$method)
```

## Type I Error

```{r}
type1 <- Tree(
  results_no_adj,
  type = "type1",
  dichotomize = TRUE
)
type1
```

![Type I Error Rate (Dichotomized)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeksterslab/manMCMedMiss/main/latexsrc/figures/png/manMCMedMiss-type1-robust.png)

## Statistical Power

```{r}
power <- Tree(
  results_no_adj,
  type = "power",
  dichotomize = TRUE
)
power
```

![Statistical Power (Dichotomized)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeksterslab/manMCMedMiss/main/latexsrc/figures/png/manMCMedMiss-power-robust.png)

## Miss Rate

```{r}
miss <- Tree(
  results_no_adj,
  type = "miss",
  dichotomize = TRUE
)
miss
```

![Miss Rate (Dichotomized)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jeksterslab/manMCMedMiss/main/latexsrc/figures/png/manMCMedMiss-miss-robust.png)
